column2: "Afei ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia ebiasa no
column4: na okegyinaa ahemfie fie afamu abanguado
column5: wɔ ɔhen ne dan no ne tsentsendo."

column3: aber a ɔhen no hun ɔhembaa Ester dɛ ogyina abangua no do no
column4: nna onyaa n’enyim enyimnyam: na ɔhen no tseen sika ahempoma a ɔdze ne nsamu no kyerɛɛ Ester. Nna Ester twee pinii
column5: na obosuoo ahempoma no ne tsir."

column4: erohwehwɛ ebɛnadze? W’ebisadze nye dɛn? Na sɛ odu ahendzi no ne fa mpo a

column3: Sɛ oye wɔ ɔhen enyi do a
column4: wɔmma ɔhen na Haman mbra pon a moroto ama no ho ndɛ da yi."
na wɔnyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ Ester aka no. Nna ɔhen no na Haman baa pon a Ester ato no ho."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see Ester wɔ nsa aponto no ho dɛ
column3: W’adzeserɛ nye dɛn? Na wɔmfa mma wo: na w’ahwehwɛdze nye dɛn? Odu ahendzi no ne fa mpo a
na sɛ ɔhen pɛ dɛ ɔbɛma m’adzeserɛ
column5: wɔmma ɔhen na Haman mbra pon a morobɔto hɔn no ho
column6: na ɔkyena mebɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen ase no."

column2: "Nna da no Haman dze enyigye na akoma pa fiir edzi: na aber a Haman hun Modekai wɔ ɔhen no kuropon no mu
column4: na eso oennhima noho amma no no
column5: nna ebufuw hyɛɛ no ma wɔ Modekai ho."

column3: na osii mu kɔr ne fie
column4: na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfrɛfrɛɛ ne mfɛfo na ne yer Zeres ma wɔbae."
na ndzɛmba nyinara a ɔhen no ayɛ no kɛse wɔ mu
column5: na mbrɛ oesi na ɔama no do abɔ mbapɔmba na ɔhen no nkowaa no do no

column4: ɔhembaa Ester ɔamma nyimpa biara annka ɔhen ho ammba pon a ɔtoe no ho gyedɛ mara; na ɔkyena so oehyia emi na ɔhen wɔ ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Naaso iyi nyinara nndɔɔ so mma me
column3: aber tsentsen ara a muhu Jewnyi Modekai no dɛ ɔtse ɔhen no kuropon mu yi."

column2: "Nna ne yer Zeres na ne mfɛfo no nyinara see no dɛ
column3: Ma yɛnyɛ mbeamudua a ne tsentsen yɛ basafa eduonu enum
column4: na ɔkyena anapa ka kyerɛ ɔhen ma wɔnsɛn Modekai wɔ do: na nkyii ɔwo nye ɔhen nkɔ aponto no ho enyigye mu. Na asɛm no yɛɛ Haman enyisɔ; na ɔmaa wɔyɛɛ dua no."
